name: Eclipse
description:
Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 seconds. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 seconds. These Exlipses occur in alternation.
Eclipse (Solar): Wrath cast time reduced 8% and damage increased 20%.
Eclipse (Lunar): Starfire cast time reduced 8% and critical strike chance increased 20%.

name: Improved Eclipse [NNF]
description: Eclipse now reduces the cast time of affected spells by 15%.

name: Improved Moonfire and Sunfire [NNF]
description: Moonfire and Sunfire duration increased by [3/6] seconds. Two Rank Talent.

name: Force of Nature
description: Summons a stand of 3 Treants for 10 sec which immediately taunt and attack enemies in the targeted area. Generates 20 Astral Power.

name: Nature's Balance
description: While in combat you generate [1/2] Astral Power every 2 seconds. While out of combat your Astral Power rebalances to 50 instead of depleting to empty. Two Rank Talent.

name: Warrior of Elune
description: Your next 3 Starfires are instant cast and generate 40% increased Astral Power

name: Starfall
description: Calls down waves of falling stars upon enemies within 40 yds, dealing Astral damage over 8 seconds.

name: Improved Moonkin Form [NNF]
description: While in Moonkin Form, single-target attacks against you have a 15% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

name: Celestial Alignment
description: Bring the celestial bodies into alignment over the target area applying Moonfire and Sunfire to all enemies. For 20 sec, both Eclipses are maintained and you gain 10% haste.

name: Improved Starsurge
description: Starsurge further empowers the damage bonus of any active Eclipse.

name: Solar Beam
description: Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Shooting Stars
description: Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.

name: Improved Starfall
description: Casting Starfall extends the duration of active Moonfires and Sunfires by [2/4] seconds. Two Rank Talent.

name: Power of Goldrinn
description: Starsurge has a chance to summon the Spirit of Goldrinn, which immediately deals Arcane damage to the target. Two Rank Talent.

name: Starlord
description: Starsurge and Starfall grant you [2/4]% Haste for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration. Two Rank Talent.

name: Stellar Drift
description: Starfall deals 50% additional damage and allows you to cast while moving while it is active, but now has a 12 sec cooldown.

name: Stellar Inspiration
description: Starsurge and Starfall have a [10/15/20]% chance to empower Eclipse or extend Moonfire and Sunfire by double the amount. Three Rank Talent.

name: Light of the Sun
description: Reduces the remaining cooldown on Solar Beam by 15 seconds when it interrupts the primary target.

name: Umbral Intensity
description: Eclipse's damage bonus to Wrath and Starfire starts [10/20/30] stronger. Three Rank Talent.

name: Precise Alignment
description: The duration of Celestial Alignment is increased by 5 seconds.

name: Choice Node
description:
Blessing of Elune
Lunar Eclipse is 3 seconds longer and Solar Eclipse is 3 seconds shorter.

Blessing of An'she
Solar Eclipse is 3 seconds longer and Lunar Eclipse is 3 seconds shorter.

name: Soul of the Forest
description: Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral power generation 50%, and increases Starfire's area effect damage by 150%.

name: Fury of the Skies
description: Moonfire increases your Arcane damage to the target, and Sunfire increases your Nature damage to the target, by [1/2]%. Two Rank Talent.

name: Choice Node
description:
Twin Moons
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.

Stellar Flare
Burns the target for a small amount of Astral damage, and then additional Astral damage over 24 seconds. Generates 8 Astral Power.

name: Solstice
description: During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 250% more often. Two Rank talent.

name: Choice Node
description:
Oneth's Clear Vision [NNF]
Starsurge has a 20% chance to make Starfall free. Starfall has a 40% chance to make Starsurge free.

Timeworn Dreambinder [NNF]
Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall by 10% and increase their damage by 10% for 5 sec, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Umbral Infusion [NNF]
description: While in an Eclipse, the cost of Starsurge and Starfall is reduced by [5/10]%. Two Rank Talent.

name: Choice Node
description:
Incarnation: Chosen of Elune
An improved Moonkin Form that grants the benefits of Celestial Alignment, and 10% critical strike chance. Lasts 30 seconds. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

Convoke the Spirits
Call upon the Druidic ancestors for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 16 Druid spells and abilities over 4 seconds. You will cast Starsurge, Starfall, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

name: Circle of Life and Death
description: Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time. Two Rank Talent.

name: Choice Node
description:
Syzygy
Celestial Alignment now blasts all targets between you and the selected area for Astral damage and applies Moonfire and Sunfire to them.

Primordial Arcanic Pulsar
Every 400 Astral Power spent grants Celestial Alignment for 12 seconds.

name: Choice Node
description:
New Moon
Deals Astral damage to the target and empowers New Moon to become Half Moon. Generates 10 Astral Power.

Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing Astral damage over 8 sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets. Generates 40 Astral Power over its duration.

name: Inproved Incarnation/Convoke [NNF]
description: Shifting out of Incarnation before it expires ends the effect and refunds a portion of its cooldown. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

name: Choice Node
description:
Adaptive Swarm
Command a swarm that heals or deals Shadow damage over 12 sec to a target, and increases the effectiveness of your periodic effects on them by 20%. Upon expiration, finds a new target, preferring to alternate between friend and foe up to 3 times.

Balance of All Things
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 24%, decreasing by 3% every 1 seconds.

name: Orbit Breaker
description: Every 30th Shooting Star calls down a Full Moon upon its target.
